results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: T(n,k) = sum_{l=k..n, l|n, k|l} l*phi(k).
formula: T(n,k) =sum_{l=k..n} A127093(n,l) * A054522(l,k), the matrix product of the infinite lower triangular matrices.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: for l from k to n do
